movies.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movies.plot: WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first Conscientious Objector in American history to receive the Congressional Medal of Honor.

movies.title: The Polka King
movies.plot: Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.

events.title: Jan Lewan's wife wins the Mrs. Pennsylvania contest
Jan Lewan is found guilty of fraud

movies.title: Prayers for Bobby
movies.plot: Bobby Griffith was his mother's favorite son, the perfect all-American boy growing up under deeply religious influences in Walnut Creek, California. Bobby was also gay. Struggling with a conflict no one knew of much less understood Bobby finally came out to his family.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 13 nominations.
